leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 可信与不确定性量化生态

queries: [WEB] uncertainty quantification library deep learning github

tools.name: hamiltorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch-based library for Riemannian Manifold Hamiltonian Monte Carlo (RMHMC) and Bayesian inference
tools.detailed_description: A library enabling Hamiltonian Monte Carlo (HMC) and Riemannian Manifold HMC (RMHMC) sampling for Bayesian Neural Networks and general probabilistic models within the PyTorch framework.

tools.name: BCUS
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Calibration, Uncertainty, and Sensitivity analysis for OpenStudio building energy models
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby-based tool developed by Argonne National Laboratory for performing Bayesian calibration, uncertainty quantification, and sensitivity analysis specifically for OpenStudio building energy models.

tools.name: FOQUS
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Optimization and Quantification of Uncertainty and Surrogates
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework developed by the CCSI Toolset for advanced simulation-based optimization, uncertainty quantification, and surrogate modeling, primarily for carbon capture and energy systems.

tools.name: EnsembleKalmanProcesses.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia library for Ensemble Kalman Inversion and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library from the Climate Modeling Alliance (CliMA) implementing Ensemble Kalman Processes for gradient-free optimization and approximate uncertainty quantification in scientific problems.

tools.name: pyvale
tools.one_line_profile: Package for sensor simulation, uncertainty quantification, and validation
tools.detailed_description: A virtual engineering laboratory package designed for sensor simulation, optimal sensor placement, and uncertainty quantification in validation experiments.

tools.name: net:cal
tools.one_line_profile: Calibration framework for measuring and mitigating miscalibration in neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library dedicated to measuring and mitigating uncertainty miscalibration in deep learning models, providing various calibration methods and metrics.

tools.name: torch-uncertainty
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for uncertainty quantification in PyTorch models
tools.detailed_description: An open-source PyTorch library designed to facilitate the development and evaluation of uncertainty quantification methods in deep learning models.

tools.name: pyroms
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools for the Regional Ocean Modeling System (ROMS)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python tools for pre- and post-processing data for the Regional Ocean Modeling System (ROMS), facilitating oceanographic simulations.

tools.name: emukit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for decision making, uncertainty quantification and statistical emulation
tools.detailed_description: A highly adaptable Python toolkit for enriching decision-making with uncertainty quantification, supporting multi-fidelity modeling, Bayesian optimization, and experimental design.

tools.name: Ensemble-Conformalized-Quantile-Regression
tools.one_line_profile: Valid and adaptive prediction intervals for probabilistic time series forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Ensemble Conformalized Quantile Regression (EnsembleCQR) for generating valid and adaptive prediction intervals in time series forecasting.

tools.name: GEEConformal
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal prediction library for Google Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: A library that brings conformal prediction capabilities to Google Earth Engine, enabling uncertainty quantification for remote sensing and geospatial data analysis.

tools.name: Probabilistic-Backpropagation
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Probabilistic Backpropagation for Bayesian neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A reference implementation of the Probabilistic Backpropagation (PBP) method for scalable Bayesian inference in deep neural networks.

tools.name: torchbnn
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch library for Bayesian Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides implementations of Bayesian Neural Networks (BNN) for PyTorch, including Bayes By Backprop and other inference methods.

tools.name: HumBugDB
tools.one_line_profile: Acoustic mosquito detection dataset and Bayesian Neural Network models
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing code and models for acoustic mosquito detection using Bayesian Neural Networks, associated with the HumBugDB dataset.

tools.name: UQ360
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification 360 toolkit
tools.detailed_description: An extensible open-source toolkit by IBM to estimate, communicate, and use uncertainty in machine learning model predictions, providing a comprehensive set of UQ algorithms and metrics.

tools.name: snowline
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for fast model fitting and comparison
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to fit and compare complex models quickly using techniques like Laplace Approximation, Variational Bayes, and Importance Sampling.

tools.name: ApproximateGPs.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Approximate Gaussian Processes in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for approximate inference in Gaussian Processes, supporting sparse variational inducing point approximations and Laplace approximation.

tools.name: ConformalPrediction.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal Prediction for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for predictive uncertainty quantification through Conformal Prediction, designed to work with machine learning models trained in MLJ.

tools.name: LaplaceRedux.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Laplace Approximation for Flux.jl neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library enabling effortless Bayesian Deep Learning through Laplace Approximation for neural networks built with Flux.jl.

tools.name: UncertaintyQuantification.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification framework for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing a framework for uncertainty quantification, including methods for reliability analysis, sensitivity analysis, and metamodeling.

tools.name: nlp-uncertainty-zoo
tools.one_line_profile: Model zoo for uncertainty quantification in NLP
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library providing implementations of various uncertainty quantification methods specifically tailored for Natural Language Processing tasks.

tools.name: Pyroomacoustics
tools.one_line_profile: A comprehensive python package for audio signal processing and room acoustics simulation
tools.detailed_description: Pyroomacoustics is a software package aimed at the rapid development and testing of audio array processing algorithms. It provides a simulation engine for room acoustics (using the image source method) and implements various beamforming and source separation algorithms.

tools.name: Brancher
tools.one_line_profile: A user-centered Python library for differentiable probabilistic programming and variational inference
tools.detailed_description: Brancher is a python library for stochastic variational inference and differentiable probabilistic programming. It is designed to be user-friendly and allows for the definition of probabilistic models using a clean and intuitive syntax, leveraging PyTorch for automatic differentiation.

tools.name: DeepProbLog
tools.one_line_profile: A neuro-symbolic framework integrating probabilistic logic programming with deep learning
tools.detailed_description: DeepProbLog extends ProbLog to integrate Probabilistic Logic Programming with deep learning. It allows for the definition of probabilistic logic models where some probabilities are parameterized by neural networks, enabling neuro-symbolic learning and reasoning.

tools.name: Deep4Cast
tools.one_line_profile: A toolkit for probabilistic multivariate time series forecasting
tools.detailed_description: Deep4Cast is a library for probabilistic multivariate time series forecasting using deep learning. It provides a unified interface for training and evaluating various deep learning models for forecasting tasks, with a focus on uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: UNIQUE
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking library for uncertainty estimation in machine learning
tools.detailed_description: UNIQUE is a Python library designed for benchmarking uncertainty estimation and quantification methods for Machine Learning model predictions. It provides a standardized framework to evaluate the quality of uncertainty estimates.

tools.name: PaddleTS
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive deep time series modeling library based on PaddlePaddle
tools.detailed_description: PaddleTS is an easy-to-use deep time series modeling library based on PaddlePaddle. It includes modules for data loading, analysis, transformation, and modeling, supporting tasks such as time series forecasting, representation learning, and anomaly detection.

tools.name: UQpy
tools.one_line_profile: General purpose toolbox for modeling uncertainty in physical and mathematical systems
tools.detailed_description: UQpy (Uncertainty Quantification with python) is a general purpose Python toolbox for modeling uncertainty in physical and mathematical systems. It serves as a comprehensive library for uncertainty quantification, offering modules for sampling, reliability analysis, and stochastic process generation.

tools.name: SciMLExpectations.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Fast uncertainty quantification for scientific machine learning and differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A package within the SciML ecosystem for calculating expectations and performing uncertainty quantification on differential equation solutions and scientific machine learning models.

tools.name: PyRoss
tools.one_line_profile: Library for inference, forecasts, and optimised control of epidemiological models
tools.detailed_description: PyRoss is a library for numerical simulation, Bayesian inference, and optimal control of age-structured contact matrix based epidemiological compartmental models.

tools.name: AgReFed-ML
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning tools for modelling and predicting agriculture systems and their uncertainties
tools.detailed_description: A collection of machine learning tools and workflows developed by the Sydney Informatics Hub for modeling agricultural systems, specifically focusing on uncertainty quantification in predictions.

tools.name: Ensemble-Pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Unified ensemble framework for PyTorch to improve model performance and robustness
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for implementing ensemble learning methods in PyTorch, aiming to enhance the performance and uncertainty estimation robustness of deep learning models.

tools.name: TorchUQ
tools.one_line_profile: Library for uncertainty quantification and calibration based on PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library dedicated to uncertainty quantification in deep learning, providing implementations for various UQ methods and calibration techniques compatible with PyTorch.

tools.name: AdvancedVI.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of variational Bayes inference algorithms for the Turing ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing advanced Variational Inference (VI) algorithms, serving as a core component for probabilistic programming and Bayesian inference within the Turing.jl ecosystem.

tools.name: EasyVVUQ
tools.one_line_profile: Framework to facilitate verification, validation, and uncertainty quantification for simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed to simplify the process of Verification, Validation, and Uncertainty Quantification (VVUQ) for a wide range of scientific simulations and computational models.

tools.name: Doubly-Stochastic-DGP
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Deep Gaussian Processes with Doubly Stochastic Variational Inference
tools.detailed_description: A library/solver implementing Deep Gaussian Processes using Doubly Stochastic Variational Inference, enabling scalable and deep probabilistic modeling.

tools.name: NeuralBKI
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Network Bayesian Kernel Inference solver for robotics and perception
tools.detailed_description: A solver implementing Neural Network Bayesian Kernel Inference, combining deep learning with Bayesian kernel methods for uncertainty-aware perception and mapping.

tools.name: LLM-judge-reporting
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for bias correction and confidence interval computation in LLM-based evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A plug-in framework for statistical analysis of LLM-as-a-judge evaluations, providing tools to correct bias and compute confidence intervals to quantify uncertainty in model reporting.

tools.name: tfcausalimpact
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of Causal Impact based on Google's R package using TensorFlow Probability
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for causal inference using Bayesian structural time-series models, built on top of TensorFlow Probability. It estimates the causal effect of a designed intervention on a time series.

tools.name: chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: Message passing neural networks for molecular property prediction with uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A library for training message passing neural networks (MPNNs) for molecular property prediction. It includes features for fast and scalable uncertainty quantification, accelerated optimization, and guided virtual screening.

tools.name: evidential-deep-learning
tools.one_line_profile: Library for learning calibrated measures of uncertainty using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A codebase for Evidential Deep Learning (EDL), allowing neural networks to learn fast, scalable, and calibrated measures of uncertainty directly from data.

tools.name: conformal-risk
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation for conformal risk control
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight library providing PyTorch implementations for conformal risk control, enabling control of monotonic risk functions in computer vision and NLP tasks.

tools.name: im2im-uq
tools.one_line_profile: Image-to-image regression with distribution-free uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library for image-to-image regression tasks that provides rigorous, distribution-free uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: vistan
tools.one_line_profile: Library to run variational inference on Stan models
tools.detailed_description: A simple Python library designed to facilitate running variational inference algorithms on models defined in the Stan probabilistic programming language.

tools.name: dpmm
tools.one_line_profile: Variational inference for Dirichlet process mixture models
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of variational inference for Dirichlet process mixture models (DPMM) with multinomial mixture components.

tools.name: pyvbmc
tools.one_line_profile: Variational Bayesian Monte Carlo algorithm in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Variational Bayesian Monte Carlo (VBMC) algorithm for posterior and model inference, suitable for computationally expensive black-box likelihoods.

tools.name: vbmc
tools.one_line_profile: Variational Bayesian Monte Carlo algorithm in MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the Variational Bayesian Monte Carlo (VBMC) algorithm for posterior and model inference.

tools.name: stan2tfp
tools.one_line_profile: Interface to the TensorFlow Probability backend of the Stan compiler
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight interface that provides the necessary objects and functions to compile a Stan program and fit the model to data using TensorFlow Probability (TFP).

tools.name: Fortuna.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for structural and system reliability analysis
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose Julia package designed for structural and system reliability analysis, providing tools for uncertainty quantification in engineering systems.

tools.name: Laplace
tools.one_line_profile: Laplace approximations for Deep Learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for applying Laplace approximations to deep learning models to estimate uncertainty and improve calibration.

tools.name: pyrodigal
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to Prodigal ORF finder
tools.detailed_description: Cython bindings and Python interface to Prodigal, a fast and reliable tool for finding open reading frames (ORFs) in genomes and metagenomes.

tools.name: bnn
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Neural Network implementation in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Bayesian Neural Networks, providing modules and tools for training BNNs and estimating uncertainty.

tools.name: SparseGaussianProcesses.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia implementation of sparse Gaussian processes via variational inference
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package implementing sparse Gaussian processes using path-wise doubly stochastic variational inference, designed for efficient probabilistic modeling.

tools.name: pybnn
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for training Bayesian Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for implementing and training Bayesian Neural Networks, providing tools for uncertainty estimation in deep learning models.

tools.name: Fortuna
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Uncertainty Quantification in Deep Learning
tools.detailed_description: A library for uncertainty quantification that provides calibration and conformal prediction methods to estimate predictive uncertainty in deep learning models.

tools.name: BayesFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Library for amortized Bayesian workflows using generative networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing amortized Bayesian inference using invertible neural networks and other generative models, facilitating complex simulation-based inference.

tools.name: pyrouge
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the ROUGE summarization evaluation package
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that wraps the ROUGE evaluation metric, commonly used in Natural Language Processing for evaluating automatic summarization and text generation.

tools.name: ctr
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation of Collaborative Topic Regression
tools.detailed_description: A C++ solver implementing variational inference for collaborative topic models, combining topic modeling with collaborative filtering for recommendation systems.

tools.name: Edward
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic programming language built on TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: A probabilistic programming library for probabilistic modeling, inference, and criticism, enabling the development of deep generative models and variational inference methods.

tools.name: pyroki
tools.one_line_profile: Modular toolkit for robot kinematic optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed for robot kinematic optimization, providing modules for modeling and solving kinematics problems in robotics research.

tools.name: GPyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient Gaussian Processes in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A highly efficient implementation of Gaussian Processes using PyTorch, designed for scalability and flexibility in probabilistic modeling and uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: LinearOperator
tools.one_line_profile: Linear operator abstractions for GPyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library providing LinearOperator abstractions to handle numerical operations efficiently, serving as the mathematical backend for GPyTorch and other scientific computing tasks.

tools.name: OpenCossan
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for uncertainty quantification and management
tools.detailed_description: An open-source MATLAB toolbox for uncertainty quantification, reliability analysis, and risk management in engineering systems.

tools.name: pyvarinf
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Deep Learning methods with Variational Inference for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that facilitates the implementation of Bayesian Deep Learning models using Variational Inference within the PyTorch framework, enabling uncertainty estimation in neural networks.

tools.name: UQLM
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification for Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for uncertainty quantification in Large Language Models (LLMs), specifically targeting the detection of hallucinations through UQ-based methods.

tools.name: DALIA
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Integrated Nested Laplace Approximations (INLA)
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Integrated Nested Laplace Approximations (INLA) methodology, used for approximate Bayesian inference in latent Gaussian models.

tools.name: DeepNano
tools.one_line_profile: Nanobody-antigen interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting nanobody-antigen interactions using ensemble deep learning and prompt-based protein language models.

tools.name: plmc
tools.one_line_profile: Inference of couplings in proteins and RNAs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for inferring couplings in proteins and RNAs from sequence variation data, often used for contact prediction and structure inference.

tools.name: puncc
tools.one_line_profile: Predictive uncertainty quantification using conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for predictive uncertainty quantification that implements various conformal prediction algorithms to provide valid coverage guarantees.

tools.name: pysvihmm
tools.one_line_profile: Stochastic variational inference for Bayesian HMMs
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of stochastic variational inference for Bayesian hidden Markov models, enabling scalable inference on time-series data.

tools.name: coverforest
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal predictions with random forests
tools.detailed_description: A library providing sklearn-compatible conformal prediction implementations using random forests for classification and regression tasks.

tools.name: nonconformist
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal prediction framework for Python
tools.detailed_description: A mature Python implementation of the conformal prediction framework, allowing for the creation of prediction intervals with guaranteed validity.

tools.name: PyTorchAVITM
tools.one_line_profile: Autoencoding Variational Inference for Topic Models
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Autoencoding Variational Inference for Topic Models (AVITM) algorithm, used for probabilistic topic modeling.

tools.name: AEPsych
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive experimentation for psychophysics
tools.detailed_description: A framework for adaptive experimentation in psychophysics and perception research, utilizing Gaussian Processes and Bayesian Optimization (via BoTorch/GPyTorch).

tools.name: PyRobot
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source Robotics Research Platform
tools.detailed_description: A high-level interface for controlling different robots, designed to facilitate robotics research and data collection.

tools.name: riadd.aucmedi
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Disease Detection in Retinal Imaging
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for multi-disease detection in retinal imaging, utilizing ensemble methods for improved performance.

tools.name: ThermoNet
tools.one_line_profile: Protein thermodynamic stability prediction
tools.detailed_description: A computational method using an ensemble of deep 3D convolutional neural networks to predict the impact of single-point mutations on protein thermodynamic stability.

tools.name: SAM2
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative modeling of protein structural ensembles
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative model for predicting protein structural ensembles, capturing the conformational heterogeneity of proteins.

tools.name: uncertain_ground_truth
tools.one_line_profile: Jax implementations of Monte Carlo conformal prediction and dermatology dataset
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing Jax implementations of Monte Carlo conformal prediction, plausibility regions, and statistical annotation aggregation methods, alongside a dermatology differential diagnosis dataset.

tools.name: Uncertainty Baselines
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality implementations of standard and SOTA uncertainty quantification methods
tools.detailed_description: A library providing high-quality implementations of standard and state-of-the-art methods for uncertainty estimation across a variety of tasks, serving as a benchmark for research.

tools.name: H2O-3
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed and scalable machine learning platform for data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source, distributed, fast, and scalable machine learning platform supporting Deep Learning, Gradient Boosting, Random Forest, and AutoML, widely used for scientific data analysis and modeling.

tools.name: crepes
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for conformal prediction and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing conformal prediction methods to produce valid prediction intervals and sets, supporting various types of regressors and classifiers.

tools.name: RAVEN
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic risk analysis, validation, and uncertainty quantification framework
tools.detailed_description: A flexible and multi-purpose framework for probabilistic risk analysis, validation, uncertainty quantification, parameter optimization, and model reduction, developed by Idaho National Laboratory.

tools.name: cca_zoo
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Canonical Correlation Analysis methods in a scikit-learn style
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a collection of Regularized, Deep Learning based, Kernel, and Probabilistic Canonical Correlation Analysis (CCA) methods, designed with a scikit-learn style interface for scientific data analysis.

tools.name: SPOT-RNA
tools.one_line_profile: RNA secondary structure prediction using deep neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting RNA secondary structures using an ensemble of two-dimensional deep neural networks and transfer learning, enabling accurate structural inference for biological research.

tools.name: Oryx
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic programming and deep learning library built on JAX
tools.detailed_description: Oryx is a library for probabilistic programming and deep learning built on top of JAX. It provides a system for building and transforming probabilistic models, enabling efficient inference and uncertainty quantification in deep learning workflows.

tools.name: DeepStack
tools.one_line_profile: Library for ensembling Keras deep learning models
tools.detailed_description: DeepStack is a Python library designed to facilitate the creation of ensembles of Keras deep learning models. It supports various ensemble strategies to improve predictive performance and robustness, which is a key technique in uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: viabel
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient variational inference and approximation bounds library
tools.detailed_description: Viabel is a Python package for efficient, lightweight variational inference (VI). It provides tools for computing approximation bounds and improving the reliability of posterior approximations in Bayesian modeling.

tools.name: conditional-conformal
tools.one_line_profile: Package for conformal prediction with conditional guarantees
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing methods for conformal prediction that provide conditional coverage guarantees. It is designed to quantify uncertainty in predictive models by constructing valid prediction intervals.

tools.name: VENI-VINDy-VICI
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for generative reduced order models with uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: An interpretable data-driven framework for building generative reduced order models (ROMs) that embed uncertainty quantification. It combines physics-informed modeling with data-driven approaches for scientific simulation.

tools.name: VinDsl.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Domain-specific language for variational inference in Julia
tools.detailed_description: VinDsl.jl is a domain-specific language (DSL) designed to simplify the specification and execution of variational inference tasks within the Julia programming environment, facilitating Bayesian analysis.

tools.name: nautilus
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Network-Boosted Importance Nested Sampling for Bayesian Statistics
tools.detailed_description: Nautilus is a Python package for efficient Bayesian posterior sampling and evidence estimation using neural network-boosted importance nested sampling. It is designed for complex astronomical and physical modeling problems.

tools.name: pyroSAR
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for large-scale SAR satellite data processing
tools.detailed_description: pyroSAR is a Python framework for large-scale processing of Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) satellite data. It provides tools for organizing, processing, and analyzing SAR data from various missions.

tools.name: chaospy
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for performing uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: Chaospy is a numerical toolbox for performing uncertainty quantification using polynomial chaos expansions and Monte Carlo methods. It allows for the modeling of uncertainty in physical simulations.

tools.name: TyXe
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Bayesian Neural Networks in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: TyXe is a library for building and training Bayesian Neural Networks (BNNs) using PyTorch. It leverages Pyro for probabilistic inference and aims to make BNNs accessible for deep learning practitioners.

tools.name: PyTorch-BayesianCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Convolutional Neural Network implementation with Variational Inference
tools.detailed_description: A widely used PyTorch implementation of Bayesian Convolutional Neural Networks using Variational Inference (Bayes by Backprop). It provides reusable layers and modules for constructing Bayesian deep learning models.

tools.name: laplax
tools.one_line_profile: Laplace approximations in JAX
tools.detailed_description: Laplax is a library for computing Laplace approximations of posterior distributions in JAX. It facilitates uncertainty quantification and model selection in Bayesian workflows.

tools.name: DeepSuperLearner
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of the deep ensemble algorithm for uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Deep Super Learner algorithm, which utilizes deep ensembles to improve predictive performance and uncertainty estimation in deep learning models.

tools.name: QUESO
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for uncertainty quantification in estimation and simulation
tools.detailed_description: QUESO (Quantification of Uncertainty for Estimation, Simulation and Optimization) is a collection of algorithms and C++ classes intended to support research in uncertainty quantification, specifically for inverse problems and statistical calibration.

tools.name: Lightning-UQ-Box
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification toolbox for Neural Networks with PyTorch Lightning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library designed to simplify the implementation and evaluation of uncertainty quantification methods for neural networks, leveraging the PyTorch Lightning framework.

tools.name: Mr.LDA
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Topic Modeling using Variational Inference in MapReduce
tools.detailed_description: A scalable implementation of Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) using variational inference, designed to run on MapReduce clusters for processing large-scale text corpora.

tools.name: DREML
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Randomized Ensembles for Metric Learning
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Deep Randomized Ensembles for Metric Learning, providing a method to improve robustness and uncertainty estimation in metric learning tasks.

tools.name: GParML
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed Variational Inference for Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing distributed variational inference in sparse Gaussian Process regression and latent variable models, enabling scalable probabilistic modeling.

tools.name: CREPE
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional Representation for Pitch Estimation
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained deep learning model and tool for high-accuracy monophonic pitch estimation from raw audio signals.

tools.name: torchcrepe
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of the CREPE pitch tracker
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the CREPE pitch estimation algorithm, allowing for GPU acceleration and integration into PyTorch-based audio processing workflows.

tools.name: Bayesianize
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian neural network wrapper for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight wrapper to convert standard PyTorch neural networks into Bayesian Neural Networks (BNNs) to enable uncertainty estimation.

tools.name: BioEmu
tools.one_line_profile: Emulator for protein equilibrium ensembles using generative deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A generative deep learning framework for scalable emulation of protein equilibrium ensembles, facilitating the study of protein dynamics and conformational heterogeneity.

tools.name: Horseshoe-BNN
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Neural Network with horseshoe prior
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Bayesian Neural Network utilizing the horseshoe prior to enhance model interpretability and sparsity.

tools.name: VI-HDS
tools.one_line_profile: Variational inference for hierarchical dynamical systems
tools.detailed_description: A library for applying variational inference methods to hierarchical dynamical systems, enabling probabilistic modeling of complex time-dependent processes.

tools.name: SIVI
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-Implicit Variational Inference implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Semi-Implicit Variational Inference (SIVI), a method for accurate uncertainty estimation using a hierarchical variational family.

tools.name: BayesianRecurrentNN
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Bayesian Recurrent Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A reusable implementation of Bayesian Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) based on Fortunato et al., enabling uncertainty quantification in sequence modeling.

tools.name: PersonalizedMultitaskLearning
tools.one_line_profile: Library for multitask machine learning methods including Hierarchical Bayesian models
tools.detailed_description: A codebase providing implementations for multitask learning approaches, including deep neural networks, Multitask Multi-kernel Learning (MTMKL), and Hierarchical Bayesian Linear Regression (HBLR).

tools.name: HopCPT
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal Prediction for Time Series with Modern Hopfield Networks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for applying conformal prediction to time series data using Modern Hopfield Networks, providing rigorous uncertainty bounds.

tools.name: SDLG
tools.one_line_profile: Method for estimating aleatoric semantic uncertainty in LLMs
tools.detailed_description: An efficient method implementation for accurately estimating aleatoric semantic uncertainty in Large Language Models (LLMs).

tools.name: TorchCP
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal prediction toolbox for deep learning in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python toolbox for research and application of conformal prediction methods on deep learning models, built on PyTorch.

tools.name: DeepSEA
tools.one_line_profile: Similarity Ensemble Approach with deep learning for chemical substance fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Similarity Ensemble Approach (SEA) using deep learning fingerprints, designed for chemoinformatics applications such as drug discovery and target prediction.

tools.name: pyrolite
tools.one_line_profile: Geochemical data analysis and visualization toolset
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for working with geochemical data, providing functions for transformation, normalization, and visualization of compositional data.

tools.name: MTUQ
tools.one_line_profile: Moment Tensor Uncertainty Quantification for seismology
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for moment tensor inversion and uncertainty quantification in seismology, allowing researchers to estimate earthquake source parameters with associated uncertainties.

tools.name: keras-uncertainty
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification utilities for Keras models
tools.detailed_description: A library providing utilities to perform uncertainty quantification on Keras models, including implementations of various Bayesian deep learning techniques.

tools.name: SMCPy
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel sequential Monte Carlo sampler for uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for uncertainty quantification using a parallel sequential Monte Carlo sampler, developed by NASA for probabilistic analysis.

tools.name: UQPCE
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification using Polynomial Chaos Expansion
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python research code for uncertainty quantification using non-intrusive polynomial chaos expansion surrogate modeling techniques.

tools.name: toupee
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Deep Learning Ensembles
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to facilitate the creation and training of deep learning ensembles, often used for improving predictive performance and uncertainty estimation.

tools.name: posteriors
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification library for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library for uncertainty quantification in PyTorch, providing tools for Bayesian inference and posterior estimation in deep learning models.

tools.name: UnaryBayes
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian framework for thermodynamic property models
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian framework for the selection, calibration, and uncertainty quantification of thermodynamic property models.

tools.name: uncertainty_gbm
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient Boosting Machines with uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: An sklearn-compatible implementation of Gradient Boosting Machines (GBM) designed to predict both the mean and standard deviation on heteroscedastic data.

tools.name: OpenTURNS
tools.one_line_profile: Library for probabilistic modeling and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive C++ library (with Python bindings) for probabilistic modeling, uncertainty quantification, and reliability analysis.

tools.name: blapsr
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian inference with Laplace approximations and P-splines
tools.detailed_description: An R package for performing Bayesian inference using Laplace approximations and P-splines, suitable for statistical modeling and smoothing.

tools.name: verified_calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Library for verified uncertainty calibration
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing methods for verified uncertainty calibration in machine learning models, as presented in the NeurIPS 2019 paper.

tools.name: CalibrationWizard
tools.one_line_profile: Guidance system for camera calibration
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to guide users through the camera calibration process by modeling geometric and corner uncertainty to ensure high-quality calibration results.

tools.name: bayesian-torch
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Bayesian neural networks in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A framework that allows users to easily convert standard PyTorch neural network definitions into Bayesian neural networks for uncertainty estimation.

tools.name: plot_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utility functions for Conformal Prediction plotting
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing utility functions for plotting metrics related to Conformal Prediction, developed for pharmaceutical bioinformatics applications.

tools.name: BLiTZ
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch layer library for Bayesian Deep Learning
tools.detailed_description: A simple and extensible library to create Bayesian Neural Network layers on PyTorch, enabling uncertainty estimation in deep learning models.

tools.name: crepes-weighted
tools.one_line_profile: Weighted conformal prediction extension for crepes
tools.detailed_description: Extension of the crepes package to enable weighted conformal prediction and conformal predictive systems that can handle covariate shifts.

tools.name: Funsor
tools.one_line_profile: Tensor-like library for probabilistic programming
tools.detailed_description: Functional tensors for probabilistic programming, providing a unified interface for probabilistic inference algorithms.

tools.name: NumPyro
tools.one_line_profile: JAX-based probabilistic programming library
tools.detailed_description: Probabilistic programming with NumPy powered by JAX for autograd and JIT compilation to GPU/TPU/CPU, serving as a backend for Pyro or standalone.

tools.name: Pyro
tools.one_line_profile: Deep universal probabilistic programming language
tools.detailed_description: A flexible, scalable deep universal probabilistic programming language built on PyTorch, supporting variational inference and MCMC.

tools.name: Pyrocko
tools.one_line_profile: Seismology toolkit for Python
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for seismology, providing tools for seismic data processing, analysis, and visualization.

tools.name: Pyrosm
tools.one_line_profile: Fast OpenStreetMap data reader for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for reading OpenStreetMap data from Protobuf files into GeoDataFrame, optimized for performance in spatial analysis.

tools.name: pyro2
tools.one_line_profile: Hydrodynamics exploration framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for hydrodynamics explorations and prototyping, used for simulation and education in computational fluid dynamics.

tools.name: PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework with dynamic computation graphs
tools.detailed_description: A widely used open source machine learning framework that accelerates the path from research prototyping to production deployment, serving as a foundation for many AI4S tools.

tools.name: admc
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic differentiation for Monte Carlo
tools.detailed_description: Infinite order automatic differentiation for Monte Carlo with unnormalized probability distribution, useful for advanced scientific computing and inference.

tools.name: PyRoboLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Robot Learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for Robot Learning, providing environments, robots, and algorithms for robotics research.

tools.name: tfprobability
tools.one_line_profile: R interface to TensorFlow Probability
tools.detailed_description: R interface to TensorFlow Probability, bringing probabilistic reasoning and statistical analysis tools to the R scientific community.

tools.name: online_conformal
tools.one_line_profile: Methods for online conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: A library providing methods for online conformal prediction, enabling uncertainty quantification in streaming data settings.

tools.name: ACPI
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Conformal Prediction Intervals
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that enhances predictive intervals provided by split conformal approaches using a weighting strategy.

tools.name: UQTk
tools.one_line_profile: Sandia Uncertainty Quantification Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight C++/Python library for uncertainty quantification, offering tools for sampling, inference, and polynomial chaos expansions.

tools.name: pyapprox
tools.one_line_profile: High-dimensional approximation and uncertainty quantification tools
tools.detailed_description: A flexible and efficient library for high-dimensional approximation, scientific machine learning, and uncertainty quantification, supporting various sparse grid and polynomial chaos expansion methods.

tools.name: Suncal
tools.one_line_profile: Sandia PSL Uncertainty Calculator
tools.detailed_description: A specialized uncertainty calculator tool developed by Sandia National Laboratories, designed for metrology and physical standards laboratory applications.

tools.name: MAPIE
tools.one_line_profile: Model Agnostic Prediction Interval Estimator
tools.detailed_description: A scikit-learn-compatible library for estimating prediction intervals and controlling risks using conformal prediction methods, applicable to regression and classification tasks.

tools.name: monaco
tools.one_line_profile: Monte Carlo library for uncertainty and sensitivity analysis
tools.detailed_description: An industry-grade Monte Carlo library designed to quantify uncertainty and sensitivities in computer models, providing tools for sampling, simulation, and statistical analysis.

tools.name: scvi-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Deep probabilistic analysis for single-cell omics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for deep probabilistic analysis of single-cell and spatial omics data, utilizing variational inference and generative models for scientific discovery in biology.

tools.name: pyrobosim
tools.one_line_profile: ROS 2 enabled 2D mobile robot simulator
tools.detailed_description: A 2D mobile robot simulator for behavior prototyping, supporting ROS 2, used for generating synthetic data and testing robotic algorithms in a simulated environment.

tools.name: Uncertainpy
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification for computational neuroscience
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis, specifically tailored towards computational neuroscience models and simulations.

tools.name: theano_pyglm
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian inference for generalized linear models in neuroscience
tools.detailed_description: A library for generalized linear models (GLMs) tailored for neural spike train modeling, supporting GPU-accelerated fully-Bayesian inference and MAP inference.

tools.name: LLM-Uncertainty-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for LLM uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool designed to evaluate and quantify the uncertainty of Large Language Models (LLMs), facilitating the assessment of model reliability.

tools.name: folktexts
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for evaluating LLM uncertainty and fairness
tools.detailed_description: A package providing datasets and tools to evaluate uncertainty, calibration, accuracy, and fairness of Large Language Models on real-world survey data.

tools.name: conformal-tights
tools.one_line_profile: Conformal prediction for scikit-learn and Darts
tools.detailed_description: A library that adds conformal prediction capabilities to any scikit-learn regressor or Darts forecaster, enabling the generation of coherent quantiles and prediction intervals.

tools.name: R-SWAT
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive web application for SWAT model calibration and uncertainty analysis
tools.detailed_description: R-SWAT is an interactive web-based application designed to facilitate parallel parameter sensitivity analysis, calibration, and uncertainty analysis for the Soil and Water Assessment Tool (SWAT and SWAT+). It provides a graphical interface for hydrologists and environmental scientists to perform complex model evaluations.

tools.name: ConformalImpact
tools.one_line_profile: Causal inference tool with conformal prediction intervals
tools.detailed_description: ConformalImpact extends the Causal Impact methodology by incorporating MFLES (Model Free Locally Estimated Scatterplot Smoothing) and conformal prediction intervals. It allows for robust causal inference and uncertainty quantification in time series analysis.

tools.name: evidential-learning-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Evidential Deep Learning for uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Evidential Deep Learning (EDL) in PyTorch, enabling deep neural networks to quantify classification and regression uncertainty by placing Dirichlet priors on class probabilities or evidential distributions on continuous targets.

tools.name: TensorFlow Probability
tools.one_line_profile: Library for probabilistic reasoning and statistical analysis in TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: TensorFlow Probability is a library for probabilistic reasoning and statistical analysis. It provides tools for building probabilistic models, performing Bayesian inference, and analyzing data with statistical distributions, integrated seamlessly with the TensorFlow ecosystem.

tools.name: ZhuSuan
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic programming library for Bayesian deep learning
tools.detailed_description: ZhuSuan is a python probabilistic programming library for Bayesian deep learning, built on Tensorflow. It provides primitives for building generative models and performing variational inference, bridging the gap between deep learning and Bayesian methods.

tools.name: ZhuSuan-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch version of the ZhuSuan probabilistic programming library
tools.detailed_description: ZhuSuan-PyTorch is a port of the ZhuSuan library to the PyTorch framework, enabling Bayesian deep learning and probabilistic programming capabilities for PyTorch users.

tools.name: Orbit
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian forecasting library with object-oriented design
tools.detailed_description: Orbit is a Python package for Bayesian time series forecasting and inference. It provides a flexible and intuitive interface for building probabilistic models, handling seasonality, trend, and regression components using MCMC or variational inference.

tools.name: Uncertainty Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for predictive uncertainty quantification, calibration, and metrics
tools.detailed_description: Uncertainty Toolbox is a Python library designed to evaluate and improve the uncertainty estimates of predictive models. It provides standard metrics (calibration error, sharpness), visualization tools, and recalibration methods for regression and classification tasks.

tools.name: Pearsonify
tools.one_line_profile: Classification intervals using Pearson residuals and conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: Pearsonify is a lightweight Python package for generating classification intervals in binary classification tasks. It leverages Pearson residuals and conformal prediction techniques to provide statistically valid uncertainty estimates.

tools.name: conformalForecast
tools.one_line_profile: Methods and tools for multistep-ahead time series conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: A package providing methods and tools for performing multistep-ahead conformal prediction on time series data, enabling uncertainty quantification in forecasting.

tools.name: flex
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic deep learning library for data streams
tools.detailed_description: A library designed for probabilistic deep learning on data streams, providing implementations for estimating probability distributions in streaming environments.

tools.name: BayeFormers
tools.one_line_profile: API for Deep Bayesian Variational Inference in Transformers
tools.detailed_description: A general API for Deep Bayesian Variational Inference by Backpropagation, designed to work with Transformer architectures and compatible with HuggingFace models.

tools.name: zfit
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable model manipulation and fitting library for probability density functions
tools.detailed_description: A model manipulation and fitting library based on TensorFlow, optimised for simple and direct manipulation of probability density functions, with a focus on scalability and parallelisation.
